description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Baltimore, United States. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Baltimore Luxe Escape on Iconic Recreation Pier
hotels.description: Baltimore's vibrant history and tranquil personality collide in the sophisticated Sagamore Pendry Baltimore, located in a memorable 1914 property on the iconic Recreation Pier. This luxurious hotel pays homage to the quintessential Baltimore essence with bespoke antique decorations, warm hospitality, and even a whiskey bar named after the 17th-century cannons discovered under the pier - a true place of reimagined tradition.

hotels.vendor_name: Kimpton Hotel Monaco Baltimore Inner Harbor
hotels.title: Heritage Downtown Baltimore City Break near Inner Harbour
hotels.description: At the junction of preserved Gilded Age luxury and heritage charm, Kimpton Hotel Monaco Baltimore Inner Harbour, an IHG Hotel offers guests the perfect base to discover one of America’s fascinating east coast cities. Located just moments from the Patapsco River harbour, this grand hotel hides countless treasures, including shining chandeliers, sweeping marble staircases and B&O American Brasserie, which serves elegant charcuterie and handcrafted cocktails every evening.

seo.title: Hôtels à Baltimore - États-Unis Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trouvez les meilleurs hôtels à Baltimore, United States avec des offres exclusives. Réservez votre escapade parfaite avec jusqu'à 60% de réduction.
